ਉਹ ਪਹਿਲੇ ਹਫ਼ਤੇ ਤੋਂ ਕੋਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਕਰ ਰਹੇ ਸਨ
They had been trying for the first week
They had been trying for a many a week
uha ika haphatē tōṁ bahuta kōśiśa kara rahē sana
ਉਹ ਇੱਕ ਹਫਤੇ ਤੋਂ ਬਹੁਤ ਕੋਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਕਰ ਰਹੇ ਸਨ
They had been trying for a many a week
They had been trying for each week
uha hara hafatē kōśiśa kara rahē sana
ਉਹ ਹਰ ਹਫ਼ਤੇ ਕੋਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਕਰ ਰਹੇ ਸਨ
They had been trying for each week
They had been leaving a good business
uha ika cagā kārōbāra chaḍa rahē sana
ਉਹ ਇੱਕ ਚੰਗਾ ਕਾਰੋਬਾਰ ਛੱਡ ਰਹੇ ਸਨ
They had been leaving a good business
They had been leaving each business
uha harēka kārōbāra nū chaḍa rahē sana
ਉਹ ਹਰੇਕ ਕਾਰੋਬਾਰ ਨੂੰ ਛੱਡ ਰਹੇ ਸਨ
They had been leaving each business
They had been calling the first mother
uha pahilī māṁ nū bulā'undē rahē sana
ਉਹ ਪਹਿਲੀ ਮਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਬੁਲਾਉਂਦੇ ਰਹੇ ਸਨ
They had been calling the first mother
They had been calling their many mothers
uha āpaṇī'āṁ bahuta sārī'āṁ māvāṁ nū bulā rahē sana
ਉਹ ਆਪਣੀਆਂ ਬਹੁਤ ਸਾਰੀਆਂ ਮਾਵਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਬੁਲਾ ਰਹੇ ਸਨ
They had been calling their many mothers
They had been calling each mother
uha hara māṁ nū bulā'undē rahē sana
ਉਹ ਹਰ ਮਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਬੁਲਾਉਂਦੇ ਰਹੇ ਸਨ
They had been calling each mother
